content.question: A block is on a horizontal surface and attached to one end of a spring, while the other end of the spring is fixed in place. The block-spring system oscillates with negligible friction on the horizontal surface. The graph shows the acceleration of the block for four different lengths of the spring. Which of the following corectly compares the magnitudes <math alttext="F sub W" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>W</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="F sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="F sub Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="F sub Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> of the force exerted by the spring on the block at points <math alttext="W" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>W</mtext></math>, <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>X</mtext></math>, <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>Y</mtext></math>, and <math alttext="Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>Z</mtext></math>, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parenthesis, F sub W equals F sub Z, close parenthesis, is greater than F sub Y, which is greater than F sub X, which equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>W</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>></mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, F sub W equals F sub Z, close parenthesis, is greater than F sub Y, which is greater than F sub X, which is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>W</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>></mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="F sub Z is greater than F sub Y, which is greater than F sub X, which is greater than F sub W, which equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>W</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="F sub Z is greater than F sub Y, which is greater than F sub X, which is greater than F sub W, which is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>W</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parenthesis, F sub W equals F sub Z, close parenthesis, is greater than F sub Y, which is greater than F sub X, which equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>W</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>></mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
